issue.title: Changing available functionnalties on resource type should launch a clean of user role on the existing resources
issue.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

When the administrator change the available functionalities on a resource type (diffusion and visualization options), a script should clean the user roles affected to the pre existing resource of this type.
This is not done for now and we could see inconsistent behaviours in resources display.

comments.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Cannot be reproduce neither on MySQL nor on SQLServer !

The clean of user role on existing resources is programmatically trigerred from the user's model save method (code to delete is in the method deleteRoleAttribution in the same model)
